content:
XmlDataSourceDesigner Class

In this Article

Provides design-time support in a visual designer for the XmlDataSource control.

Syntax

Declaration

public class XmlDataSourceDesigner : System.Web.UI.Design.HierarchicalDataSourceDesigner, System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner

Inheritance Hierarchy

  • Object
  • ComponentDesigner
  • HtmlControlDesigner
  • ControlDesigner
  • System.Web.UI.Design.HierarchicalDataSourceDesigner
  • XmlDataSourceDesigner

Remarks

The XmlDataSourceDesigner class is intended for use by the XmlDataSource control, and not intended for use by developers of custom XML data source controls.

Constructors summary

XmlDataSourceDesigner()

Initializes a new instance of the XmlDataSourceDesigner class.

Properties summary

CanConfigure

Gets a value indicating whether the stem.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDataSourceDesigner.Configure* method can be called.
CanRefreshSchema

Gets a value indicating whether the stem.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema* method can be called.
Data

Gets or sets a block of XML that the associated data source control binds to.
DataFile

Gets or sets the file name of an XML file that the associated data source control binds to.
Transform

Gets or sets a block of Extensible Stylesheet Language (XSL) that defines an XSLT transformation to perform on the XML data that is contained by the stem.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDataSourceDesigner.Data* property or by the XML file that is indicated by the stem.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDataSourceDesigner.DataFile* property.
TransformFile

Gets or sets the file name of an Extensible Stylesheet Language (XSL) file (.xsl) that defines an XSLT transformation to perform on the XML data that is contained by the stem.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDataSourceDesigner.Data* property or by the XML file that is indicated by the stem.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDataSourceDesigner.DataFile* property.
XPath

Gets or sets an XPath query to apply to the XML data that is contained by the stem.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDataSourceDesigner.Data* property or by the XML file that is indicated by the stem.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDataSourceDesigner.DataFile* property.

Methods summary

Configure()

Launches the configuration wizard for the underlying data source.
GetView(String)

Retrieves the design-time data source view object for the associated XmlDataSource control.
Initialize(IComponent)

Initializes the designer and loads the specified component.
PreFilterProperties(IDictionary)

Used by a designer component to add properties to or remove properties from, the Properties grid in a design host at design time or to provide new design-time properties that might correspond to properties on the associated control.
RefreshSchema(Boolean)

Refreshes the schema from the data source, while optionally suppressing events.

Explicit Interface Implementations summary

For a description of this member, see stem.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner.CanConfigure*.

For a description of this member, see stem.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner.CanRefreshSchema*.

For a description of this member, see stem.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner.Configure*.

For a description of this member, see stem.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner.GetView*.

For a description of this member, see stem.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner.GetViewNames*.

For a description of this member, see stem.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema*.
IDataSourceDesigner.ResumeDataSourceEvents()

For a description of this member, see stem.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner.ResumeDataSourceEvents*.
IDataSourceDesigner.SuppressDataSourceEvents()

For a description of this member, see stem.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner.SuppressDataSourceEvents*.

Constructors

  • XmlDataSourceDesigner()

    Initializes a new instance of the XmlDataSourceDesigner class.

    public XmlDataSourceDesigner ();

Properties

  • CanConfigure

    Gets a value indicating whether the stem.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDataSourceDesigner.Configure* method can be called.

    public override bool CanConfigure { get; }

    Property Value

    • Boolean

      true, if the stem.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDataSourceDesigner.Configure* method can be called; otherwise, false. The default is false.

  • CanRefreshSchema

    Gets a value indicating whether the stem.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema* method can be called.

    public override bool CanRefreshSchema { get; }

    Property Value

    • Boolean

      true, if the stem.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema* method can be called, otherwise false. The default is false.

  • Data

    Gets or sets a block of XML that the associated data source control binds to.

    public string Data { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • String

      A string of XML data.

    Remarks

    The Data property shadows the same property in the associated control, and is intended for internal use only.

  • DataFile

    Gets or sets the file name of an XML file that the associated data source control binds to.

    public string DataFile { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • String

      An XML file name.

    Remarks

    The DataFile property shadows the same property in the associated control, and is intended for internal use only.

  • Transform

    Gets or sets a block of Extensible Stylesheet Language (XSL) that defines an XSLT transformation to perform on the XML data that is contained by the stem.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDataSourceDesigner.Data* property or by the XML file that is indicated by the stem.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDataSourceDesigner.DataFile* property.

    public string Transform { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • String

      An XSL data string.

    Remarks

    The Transform property shadows the same property in the associated control, and is intended for internal use only.

  • TransformFile

    Gets or sets the file name of an Extensible Stylesheet Language (XSL) file (.xsl) that defines an XSLT transformation to perform on the XML data that is contained by the stem.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDataSourceDesigner.Data* property or by the XML file that is indicated by the stem.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDataSourceDesigner.DataFile* property.

    public string TransformFile { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • String

      The XSLT file name.

    Remarks

    The Transform property shadows the same property in the associated control, and is intended for internal use only.

  • XPath

    Gets or sets an XPath query to apply to the XML data that is contained by the stem.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDataSourceDesigner.Data* property or by the XML file that is indicated by the stem.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDataSourceDesigner.DataFile* property.

    public string XPath { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • String

      An XPath query.

    Remarks

    The Transform property shadows the same property in the associated control, and is intended for internal use only.

Methods

  • Configure()

    Launches the configuration wizard for the underlying data source.

    public override void Configure ();

    Remarks

    The Configure method is called by the design host, if the CanConfigure property is true.

  • GetView(String)

    Retrieves the design-time data source view object for the associated XmlDataSource control.

    public override System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerHierarchicalDataSourceView GetView (string viewPath);

    Parameters

    • viewPath
      String

      The path to the view to retrieve.

    Returns

    • DesignerHierarchicalDataSourceView

      The design-time data source view object for the associated XmlDataSource control.

  • Initialize(IComponent)

    Initializes the designer and loads the specified component.

    public override void Initialize (System.ComponentModel.IComponent component);

    Parameters

    • component
      IComponent

      The component.

  • PreFilterProperties(IDictionary)

    Used by a designer component to add properties to or remove properties from, the Properties grid in a design host at design time or to provide new design-time properties that might correspond to properties on the associated control.

    protected override void PreFilterProperties (System.Collections.IDictionary properties);

    Parameters

    • properties
      IDictionary

      An IDictionary of properties.

  • RefreshSchema(Boolean)

    Refreshes the schema from the data source, while optionally suppressing events.

    public override void RefreshSchema (bool preferSilent);

    Parameters

    • preferSilent
      Boolean

      true to suppress schema UI events; otherwise, false.

Explicit Interface Implementations

  • IDataSourceDesigner.CanConfigure

    For a description of this member, see stem.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner.CanConfigure*.

    bool System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner.CanConfigure { get; }

    Returns

    • Boolean

      true if the data source can be configured; otherwise false.

    Remarks

    This member is an explicit interface member implementation. It can be used only when the XmlDataSourceDesigner instance is cast to an IDataSourceDesigner interface.

  • IDataSourceDesigner.CanRefreshSchema

    For a description of this member, see stem.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner.CanRefreshSchema*.

    bool System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner.CanRefreshSchema { get; }

    Returns

    • Boolean

      true if the schema can be refreshed; otherwise false.

    Remarks

    This member is an explicit interface member implementation. It can be used only when the XmlDataSourceDesigner instance is cast to an IDataSourceDesigner interface.

  • IDataSourceDesigner.Configure()

    For a description of this member, see stem.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner.Configure*.

    void IDataSourceDesigner.Configure ();

    Remarks

    This member is an explicit interface member implementation. It can be used only when the XmlDataSourceDesigner instance is cast to an IDataSourceDesigner interface.

  • IDataSourceDesigner.GetView(String)

    For a description of this member, see stem.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner.GetView*.

    System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerDataSourceView IDataSourceDesigner.GetView (string viewName);

    Parameters

    • viewName
      String

      The name of a view in the underlying data source.

    Returns

    • DesignerDataSourceView

      A DesignerDataSourceView object containing information about the identified view, or null if a view with the specified name is not found.

    Remarks

    This member is an explicit interface member implementation. It can be used only when the XmlDataSourceDesigner instance is cast to an IDataSourceDesigner interface.

  • IDataSourceDesigner.GetViewNames()

    For a description of this member, see stem.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner.GetViewNames*.

    string[] IDataSourceDesigner.GetViewNames ();

    Returns

    • String[]

      An array of names of the views in the data source.

    Remarks

    This member is an explicit interface member implementation. It can be used only when the XmlDataSourceDesigner instance is cast to an IDataSourceDesigner interface.

  • IDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema(Boolean)

    For a description of this member, see stem.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema*.

    void IDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema (bool preferSilent);

    Parameters

    • preferSilent
      Boolean

      Specifies whether to suppress any events raised while refreshing the schema.

    Remarks

    This member is an explicit interface member implementation. It can be used only when the XmlDataSourceDesigner instance is cast to an IDataSourceDesigner interface.

  • IDataSourceDesigner.ResumeDataSourceEvents()

    For a description of this member, see stem.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner.ResumeDataSourceEvents*.

    void IDataSourceDesigner.ResumeDataSourceEvents ();

    Remarks

    This member is an explicit interface member implementation. It can be used only when the XmlDataSourceDesigner instance is cast to an IDataSourceDesigner interface.

  • IDataSourceDesigner.SuppressDataSourceEvents()

    For a description of this member, see stem.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner.SuppressDataSourceEvents*.

    void IDataSourceDesigner.SuppressDataSourceEvents ();

    Remarks

    This member is an explicit interface member implementation. It can be used only when the XmlDataSourceDesigner instance is cast to an IDataSourceDesigner interface.
